sentences.en: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.cn: 4的3次方是4^3。

sentences.en: A lot of this has to do with power and greed.
sentences.cn: 凡此种种都和权力与贪欲有关。

sentences.en: a plan vetoed by the powers that be.
sentences.cn: 被掌权者们否决了的计划

sentences.en: After the accident she lost the power of speech (= ability to speak ) .
sentences.cn: 那次事故之后，她丧失了语言能力。

sentences.en: Any number to the power of nought is equal to one.
sentences.cn: 任何数的0次方等于1。

sentences.en: Fathers have the power to dominate children and young people.
sentences.cn: 父辈们有能力支配孩子们和年轻人的生活。

sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
sentences.cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。

sentences.en: He grandly declared that "international politics is a struggle for power".
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地宣称“国际政治是一场权力之争”。

sentences.en: He scares teams to death with his pace and power.
sentences.cn: 他的速度之快、力量之大让其他队胆战不已。

sentences.en: High winds have knocked down trees and power lines.
sentences.cn: 大风刮倒了树木和电线。

sentences.en: Idi Amin came into power several years later.
sentences.cn: 伊迪·阿明几年后执掌了政权。

sentences.en: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.cn: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.en: Jackson had been a major power-broker in the 1988 Presidential elections.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊是1988年总统选举中举足轻重的权力经纪人。

sentences.en: Make sure the power is switched off first.
sentences.cn: 一定要先关闭电源。

sentences.en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentences.cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentences.en: Sovereign power will continue to lie with the Supreme People's Assembly.
sentences.cn: 最高统治权仍然掌握在最高人民会议手中。

sentences.en: The banks have the power to pull the plug on the project.
sentences.cn: 银行有能力让该工程终止。

sentences.en: The money to build the power station ought to have been sufficient.
sentences.cn: 建设电站的资金本该足够了。

sentences.en: The old-timers and established families clutched the reins of power.
sentences.cn: 久居此地的居民和根基稳固的家族牢牢掌控着权力。

sentences.en: The power came back on.
sentences.cn: 电力恢复了。

sentences.en: the power of a cheetah’s long legs
sentences.cn: 猎豹长腿的威力

sentences.en: the power of a cheetah’s long legs ＃
sentences.cn: 猎豹长腿的威力

sentences.en: The power stations burn coal from the Ruhr region.
sentences.cn: 发电站烧的煤产自鲁尔地区。

sentences.en: the pulling power (= ability to attract people or attention ) of major celebrities
sentences.cn: 大名人的吸引力

sentences.en: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.cn: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.en: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.cn: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.en: The whole car shuddered with an almost frightening surge of power.
sentences.cn: 油门猛然加大到几乎让人恐惧的程度，整个汽车剧烈震颤着。

sentences.en: They seized power in a military coup.
sentences.cn: 他们在一场军事政变中夺取了政权。

words.tran_cn: 有动力装置的；以…为动力的
无力的；[劳经] 无能力的，无权的
促进（power的过去分词）；给…提供动力
激励；供以动力；使…有力量

phrases.phrase: do someone/thing a power of good

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 执政的；掌权的；当权的
(英)（表示鼓励、赞同）祝一帆风顺！祝你成功！
幕后操纵者，垂帘听政者
发电，发电量；发电机设备
电网，电力系统；动力系统
掌权者：在某一系统或职位中掌握实权的人
火力；火力发电；热功率；热电站

trans.tran_en: clothes which you wear at work to make you look important or confident

trans.tran_cn: 权力，能力，操纵力，职权，政权，体力，强国，实力，影响力，动力，能量，电力供应，幂，放大率，势力
trans.tran_en: the ability or right to control people or events
to supply power to a vehicle or machine
